00029   {
00030     class Sequence;
00031   }
00032 
00033 namespace Circal
00034   {
00035 
00036     class ScoringModel;
00037     class MatrixHelper;
00038     class Output;
00039     typedef std::vector< std::vector<double> > ScoreMatrix;
00040 
00041     class Alignment : public bpp::AlignedSequenceContainer
00042       {
00043     protected:
00044         int Score;
00045         Output* prettyPrint;
00046         MatrixHelper* matrix;
00047         uint origSize;
00048         
00049     public:
00050         explicit Alignment(const bpp::Alphabet* alpha);
00051         virtual ~Alignment();
00052         uint get_origSize() const;
00053         int get_Score() const;
00054         void set_score(const int &s);
00055         void set_origSize(const uint &orig);
00056         void addSequence(const bpp::Sequence & sequence, bool checkNames)
00057             throw(bpp::Exception);
00058         void addSequence(const bpp::Sequence & sequence)
00059             throw(bpp::Exception);
00060 
00061         //Needleman Wunsch Alignment
00062         virtual Alignment* NeedlemanWunschAlignment(const bpp::Sequence* inA,
00063             const bpp::Sequence* inB, const ScoringModel* scoreM);
00064         virtual void
00065             ForwardRecursionNMW(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00066                 const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00067                 ScoreMatrix* D);
00068         virtual Alignment* BacktrackingNMW(const bpp::Sequence* outA,
00069             const bpp::Sequence* outB, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00070             const ScoreMatrix* D);
00071 
00072         //Gotoh Alignment
00073         virtual Alignment* GotohAlignment(const bpp::Sequence* inA,
00074             const bpp::Sequence* inB, const ScoringModel* scoreM);
00075         virtual void ForwardRecursionGotoh(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00076             const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00077             ScoreMatrix* D, ScoreMatrix* P, ScoreMatrix* Q);
00078         virtual Alignment* BacktrackingGotoh(const bpp::Sequence* outA,
00079             const bpp::Sequence* outB, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00080             const ScoreMatrix* D, const ScoreMatrix* P, const ScoreMatrix* Q);
00081 
00082       };
00083   }
